entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: WSW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
